channel.title: Soap on Brubaker's Soap Shack
channel.description: Recent content in Soap on Brubaker's Soap Shack

item.title: Sundrenched Vineyard
item.description: Crisp citrus peel highlights this berry blend as watery green accents create the refreshing top note. Warm woods and golden amber add smooth sweetness at the base of the scent.

item.title: Vanilla Latte
item.description: Inspired by the fresh air and brilliant colors of a stroll through a secluded wood in autumn with notes of oak, citrus and golden amber.
